org.apache.freemarker.servlet

Class FreemarkerServletConfigurationBuilder<SelfT extends FreemarkerServletConfigurationBuilder<SelfT>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.freemarker.core.MutableProcessingConfiguration<SelfT>
      • org.apache.freemarker.core.MutableParsingAndProcessingConfiguration<SelfT>
        • org.apache.freemarker.core.Configuration.ExtendableBuilder<SelfT>
          • org.apache.freemarker.servlet.FreemarkerServletConfigurationBuilder<SelfT>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.freemarker.core.ParsingAndProcessingConfiguration, org.apache.freemarker.core.ParsingConfiguration, org.apache.freemarker.core.ProcessingConfiguration, org.apache.freemarker.core.TopLevelConfiguration, org.apache.freemarker.core.util.CommonBuilder<org.apache.freemarker.core.Configuration>

    public class FreemarkerServletConfigurationBuilder<SelfT extends FreemarkerServletConfigurationBuilder<SelfT>>
extends org.apache.freemarker.core.Configuration.ExtendableBuilder<SelfT>
    Changes some defaults compared to Configuration.ExtendableBuilder, to values that makes more sense for the FreemarkerServlet.
